DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe Metallix Face Paint Palettes (6 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
The Wolfe Metallix Face Paint Palette includes 6 Wolfe Metallix paints (5 grams each), one face paint brush and a handy travel case.
Use Wolfe Metallix paint for an effective metallic sheen. Wolfe Metallix colors are considered to be the best available today.
With dense pigmentation, Wolfe Hydrocolor Face Paints provide brilliant color and opaque coverage. They are uniquely easy to apply: they go on smoothly, evenly and do not crack once dry. The difference with Wolfe FX Hydrocolor makeup is a wax base so the colors flex with movement instead of cracking, so your face paint designs stay on longer and remain beautiful. Under normal circumstances Wolfe face paint will not smear after it's been applied. Paint your kids in the morning and they will remain bright and colorful all day long. Wolfe paints are also comfortable to wear. Wolfe Metallix paints add a metallic glittery sheen to the skin.
The Wolfe Paint Metallix Palette includes: Metallic Rose (M30), Metallic Gold (M100), Metallic White (M01), Metallic Forest Green(M62), Metallic Blue (M70), and Metallic Fuchsia (M32).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 6 color Wolfe Metallix Face Paint Palette is good for 50-200 applications
The Wolfe Paint Metallix Palette includes: Metallic Rose (M30), Metallic Gold (M100), Metallic White (M01), Metallic Forest Green(M62), Metallic Blue (M70), and Metallic Fuchsia (M32)
Metallic colors give a glistening effect to a face paint design
Easy to apply and easy to remove; just use soap and water
Dense pigmentation makes the essential colors brilliant and vibrant
